summary: The diff shows a comprehensive redesign of the LoginPage component that matches all requirements from REQ-46 and REQ-47. The implementation includes the visual mockup design (centered card, Welcome Back heading, Salad Khatora subtitle, email/password fields with icons, green Sign In button, sign up and back to home links) while maintaining Internet Identity authentication. All acceptance criteria appear to be satisfied.

hallucinated_features.description: Dark mode support with dark theme class variants (dark:from-background, dark:to-accent, dark:text-fresh-400, dark:text-gray-400, etc.)
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention implementing dark mode or theme support. The constraints only require responsive and mobile-friendly design.

hallucinated_features.description: Gradient background (bg-gradient-to-br from-gray-50 to-gray-100) instead of plain background
hallucinated_features.reason: The mockup description does not specify a gradient background, only mentions 'centered on the page'

hallucinated_features.description: Loading spinner animation and 'Connecting...' text during authentication
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not specify any loading state visual feedback during authentication

hallucinated_features.description: Sign up button/link triggers Internet Identity authentication (onClick={login})
hallucinated_features.reason: The requirement states 'Don't have an account? Sign up' link should be present, but does not specify it should trigger authentication. Non-goals explicitly state 'Creating user registration functionality' should not be implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: Back to Home link navigates to '/dashboard' instead of a home page
hallucinated_features.reason: The requirement specifies 'Back to Home' link but the implementation navigates to dashboard, which may not be the intended home page
